/** * Function: smarty_make_timestamp
* Purpose: used by other smarty functions to make a timestamp from a string. * * @author Monte Ohrt * @param DateTime|int|string $string date object, timestamp or string that can be converted using strtotime() * @return int */
// it is mysql timestamp format of YYYYMMDDHHMMSS?
// it is a numeric string, we handle it as timestamp
// strtotime() was not able to parse $string, use "now":

/** * Function: smarty_make_timestamp
* Purpose: used by other smarty functions to make a timestamp from a string. * * @author Monte Ohrt * @param DateTime|int|string $string date object, timestamp or string that can be converted using strtotime() * @return int */
